name: Handsome Cable Pumpkin
description: Perfect for fall! So handsome! So squishy!
suggested_yarn: Lily (Spinrite) Sugar'n Cream Crafter's Cotton Make it Quick Solids
full_text: Perfect for fall! So handsome! So squishy! The perfect combination of fall decor and cozy cables. Final pumpkin size is roughly 12-14 inches in diameter, but could vary widely depending on stuffing. Materials needed: Orange worsted weight yarn for pumpkin ~600 yds Brown worsted weight yarn for stem ~25 yds (Stiff yarn will help the stem hold its shape.) Size 2 DPNs Size 6 circular needles (16 or 24 inch should work) Cable needle or extra DPN Stitch markers Stuffing Crochet hook or darning needle Please note: This is my first pattern written and hasn’t been through test knitting. I am not a professional. Please reach out if you run into typos or issues. It’s free for this reason. Update 9/4/21: Revised due to typos at rounds 104 to 107, 115, and 124. Special thanks to RamonaAnne for helping to catch them!
